attributes.action: Give a 20% discount for International Students' tuition fees
attributes.additional_details: We're not getting to experience society life, which is a major part of doing a degree abroad. We're facing mental health struggles as we can’t return home due to restrictions. UK Government & universities lied by saying COVID-19 was in control in the UK, enforcing lockdowns after, affecting our mental & physical health, trapping us away from our loved ones & with no one to rely on for help. Financial struggles due to expensive fees and conversion rates, which skyrocketed during this pandemic.
attributes.background: We international students want to be treated fairly for the struggles we're facing, therefore, we would like a minimum of 20% discount of our tuition fees. Non-EU International students pay tuition fees which range from around £13,000 up to £37,000 per year depending on the university and course.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
